articles.description: "There's nothing in the universe that looks fast to this camera."
articles.content: Once upon a time, our only option for getting clothes clean was to get out a bucket of soapy water and start scrubbing. Nowadays, we use fancy machines that not only do the labor for us, but give us … [+2524 chars]
